Text: The 5% rule for company shareholders To qualify for ER, the company needs to be an individual's 'personal company' where the individual must: be a company employee or office holder hold at least 5% of the company's ordinary share capital and be able to exercise at least 5% of the voting rights.
Cause: The 5% rule for company shareholders To qualify for ER
Effect: the company needs to be an individual's 'personal company' where the individual must: be a company employee or office holder hold at least 5% of the company's ordinary share capital and be able to exercise at least 5% of the voting rights.
Sentence: <e1>The 5% rule for company shareholders To qualify for ER</e1>, <e2>the company needs to be an individual's 'personal company' where the individual must: be a company employee or office holder hold at least 5% of the company's ordinary share capital and be able to exercise at least 5% of the voting rights.</e2>
